attributes.action: revoke the decision to make Wiltshire a unitary Council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wiltshire County Council's decision to support a unitary bid was supported by only about half of its Councillors, all 4 District Councils voted against it, & it has little or no support from Town or Parish Councils. The projected savings are impossible without centralising services to the detriment of the people of Wiltshire. Not to mention the loss of democratic accountability.
